    • Method Detail

      • executeGetRequest

        @NonNull
HttpGetResult executeGetRequest(@NonNull
                                          java.net.URI uri,
                                          @Nullable
                                          java.lang.String contentType,
                                          @Nullable
                                          HttpCredentialsInterface credentials)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a http connection and sets up an input stream.
        Parameters:
        uri - of the stream
        contentType - check the returned Mime Type to ensure it matches. "text/xml" causes a Hash to be calculated
        credentials - to use for this executeGetRequest request
        Returns:
        HttpGetResult - An object containing the Stream, Hash and Headers
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - various Exceptions such as IOException can be thrown

      • executeHeadRequest

        @NonNull
HttpHeadResult executeHeadRequest(@NonNull
                                            java.net.URI uri,
                                            @Nullable
                                            HttpCredentialsInterface credentials)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs a Http Head request.
        Parameters:
        uri - of which to perform a Http head
        credentials - to use for this head request
        Returns:
        HttpHeadResult containing status code and headers
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - various Exceptions such as IOException can be thrown

      • uploadSubmissionFile

        @NonNull
HttpPostResult uploadSubmissionFile(@NonNull
                                              java.util.List<java.io.File> fileList,
                                              @NonNull
                                              java.io.File submissionFile,
                                              @NonNull
                                              java.net.URI uri,
                                              @Nullable
                                              HttpCredentialsInterface credentials,
                                              @NonNull
                                              long contentLength)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Uploads files to a Server.
        Parameters:
        fileList - List of Files to be uploaded
        submissionFile - The main file to be uploaded (Form file)
        uri - where to send the submissionFile and fileList
        contentLength - contentLength requested by the server
        Returns:
        ResponseMessageParser object that contains the response XML
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - can be thrown if files do not exist
        java.lang.Exception
